title: Yoga for health
creator_contributor_role: Ministry of Information and Broadcasting, production company
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/India - Social life and customs
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Discipline
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Meditation
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Yoga
description: An introduction to the ancient science of Yoga. Yoga is the disciplining of all human powers - physical, metal, moral and spiritual. Then aim is not only bodily strength but health, stamina and mental awareness - qualities that people need whether at work or play. This documentary shows some Asanas which, if practised, can serve as a foundation of good health.
